donate.args0:
We are changing and you are changing too...
 We present you a Subscription that will be waiting for you, so to speak, the reward

Who includes a subscription:
 ・ Access to premium teams
 - Access to statistics
 ・ Private chats on the official SPR server
 ・ Doubled coins and experience 

 To buy a subscription, write ・ s!donate [premium,plus]
donate.premium:
```fix
SPR Premium```
・Access to premium teams
・The commission when transferring coins is 1%
・Doubled experience
・Doubled coins
・+ 3500 coins
・Custom role

card.eDescript:
```fix
SPR Card```
・Transfer up to 15,000 coins
・The commission for the transfer of coins is 1% (if there is platinum)
・+ 50 coins (test account)

info.err_nocard:
You don't have a card at the moment!
 To purchase, write `s!card buy`

clear.permision: Sorry, but you don't have rights!
clear.maxmess: Specify the number of messages to delete (max. 100 messages)

money.title: What are Coins in
money.description:
Coins are the currency inside the bot ${config.bot.name }
 The given currency is earned very easily:
If you want to earn it, just write to the chat.
 For every message you receive ${config.price.money} coins.
 Premium-users get twice as much - ${config.price.money_premium} coins

lang.title: Language selection for the bot on this server
lang.description:
Our bot supports 4 languages, these are: 🇷🇺,🇺🇸,🇵🇱,🇯🇵
 To change the language, click on the button below or cancel

bank.desc:
What is a bank?A bank is a place where your money is stored.
 To use the bank, you need to buy a card 
 t.k. your card's Personal Account is linked to the bank 

S with each level, your allowable account increases
example: 
 you have level 4
4 * 10000 = 40000 - this is your maximum allowable balance in the bank

start.db: You are already in the Bot Database!
